attributes.review: When I opened it, it gave me rapist and racist vibes. Then, I put my phone number in and started getting spam calls 24/7. I was very upset. Then I remembered that I have to go walk my pillow because it had grass on it. The app is a mood killer. Immediately after I put my phone number trump texted me and told me that he doesn’t know how to drink water. Then my pet car pooped his skirt and told me that trump made him do it. Not only does he take away children from their parents, rape minors, but tells cars to poop their skirt. Very bad president he should quit.

attributes.review: i just wanted to know when the next rally would be but this app sold my info to china!!!! my icloud was hacked and so was my bank account😭😭😭 i’m working ok getting my social security number back now but i just wanted to warn anyone trying to download this app, this app gives ur data away!!!!! in addition my child got kicked out of college because the app accused him of cheating on finals then threw a party and trashed the school during break😢 the app also donated $20000! i lost $20000!!!!! it was donated to a harry potter fan account😨😱😨😨 my life is ruined because of this app and i may never be able to show my face in public again after this app photoshopped an embarrassing picture of me and sent it to all my contacts🥺🥺🥺🥺 i wish i could give it 0/5!!!!! save ur life, DON’T DOWNLOAD!!!!!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app is horrible it distracted my son and made him hit his head.The content is very offensive and disgusting 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮.They should delete this app it could traumatize small children 😔and scar them for life.
